meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #713.

td.p: Judi Owens, an elementary school administrator from Bricktown, New Jersey
Suzee Vlk, a writer from San Diego, California
Bob Imsande, a retired business executive originally from St. Louis, Missouri

tr.td: LANGUAGES
FOOD
BASKETBALL
F. SCOTT FITZGERALD
HODGEPODGE
"HOUSE"s
